channel.title: hugo on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: 拉取我的hugo博客
item.description: 从github上拉取博客md文件 1 2 ap git clone https://github.com/yongjuntang/yongjuntang.github.io.git blog #ap是代理别名 进入blog目录 1 cd blog 初始化子模块（hugo 主题是以子模块的形式存在) 1 git submodule init
